✏️ There's something about the class name that doesn't feel right.
I think its because RestSecurity implies that this class is providing security for rest, but instead this class encoding/decoding (and inflating/deflating) for rest.
Maybe a name like "RestTranscoder" (who needs real words 😏) or something would land better. Just a suggestion tho
